title: Google for Work is free if youre tied to a Microsoft or IBM Enterprise Agreement
text:
Google for Work is free if you're tied to a Microsoft or IBM Enterprise Agreement 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
an audacious offer to businesses tempted to try switching away from Microsoft or IBM. 
The company said that it will provide Google Apps For Work free of charge to any company wishing to take it up, for as long as they have Enterprise Agreement (EA) with a rival service. 
Google For Work was...
